channel.title: The Tribe: A Survivor Podcast
channel.description: Each week, The Tribe dissects the latest episode of the flagship CBS reality show Survivor. From how they would have fared in a certain immunity challenge to just how Jeff Probst manages to maintain his dimples, they talk about it all, with lots of listener feedback, games, and a bunch of other fun surprises thrown in too. So what are you waiting for? Come join these veteran podcasters on their journey through wherever it is Mark Burnett decides to take us all next. The Tribe has spoken!
channel.itunes:summary: Each week, The Tribe dissects the latest episode of the flagship CBS reality show Survivor. From how they would have fared in a certain immunity challenge to just how Jeff Probst manages to maintain his dimples, they talk about it all, with lots of listener feedback, games, and a bunch of other fun surprises thrown in too. So what are you waiting for? Come join these veteran podcasters on their journey through wherever it is Mark Burnett decides to take us all next. The Tribe has spoken!

item.title: Cambodia: Second Chance Preview Show
item.dc:creator: The Tribe
item.description: The Tribe is back to preview the brand new season of Survivor, run through the castaways, play Merge or No Merge, and unveil their overall picks for this season’s fantasy league!

item.title: The Sorting Buff: Cambodia
item.dc:creator: The Tribe
item.description: Dearest Muggles, The Wizards of The Tribe, bust out their wands and pull the Survivor Sorting Buff out of storage to determine which Hogwarts House the cast of Survivor Cambodia belong…. We solemnly swear we are up to no good…
item.content:encoded:
Dearest Muggles,

The Wizards of The Tribe, bust out their wands and pull the Survivor Sorting Buff out of storage to determine which Hogwarts House the cast of Survivor Cambodia belong…. We solemnly swear we are up to no good…

item.title: Survivor Crazy Mountains Retrospective Part 2
item.dc:creator: The Tribe
item.description: The Tribe brings you part 2 of a very special retrospective of Heiko Reality’s Survivor: Crazy Mountains! Tim is joined by Paul, Shandy, Martha and Daron for an in depth look at this Montanan all-star season of Survivor. Also if you haven’t seen it yet, this is the second part of an indepth spoiler filled […]
item.content:encoded: The Tribe brings you part 2 of a very special retrospective of Heiko Reality’s Survivor: Crazy Mountains!  Tim is joined by Paul, Shandy, Martha and Daron for an in depth look at this Montanan all-star season of Survivor.  Also if you haven’t seen it yet, this is the second part of an indepth spoiler filled talk about it, so please check out this season on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Heiko401 and make sure to watch this fan made tribute to Shandy: http://youtu.be/ESEFTJzOo-U
item.itunes:subtitle: The Tribe brings you part 2 of a very special retrospective of Heiko Reality's Survivor: Crazy Mountains! Tim is joined by Paul, Shandy, Martha and Daron for an in depth look at this Montanan all-star season of Survivor.
item.itunes:summary: The Tribe brings you part 2 of a very special retrospective of Heiko Reality's Survivor: Crazy Mountains! Tim is joined by Paul, Shandy, Martha and Daron for an in depth look at this Montanan all-star season of Survivor. Also if you haven't seen it yet, this is the second part of an indepth spoiler filled talk about it, so please check out this season on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Heiko401 and make sure to watch this fan made tribute to Shandy: http://youtu.be/ESEFTJzOo-U

item.title: 50 Shades of The Tribe
item.dc:creator: The Tribe
item.description: NSFW!!! Today on 50 Shades of The Tribe, Shandy, Tim and Colleen strap on the leather and bust out the safe words to bring you this off-season podcast! They dig deep to discuss the book and movie 50 Shades of Grey. They are also joined by several subs.. erm… guests. AGAIN! NSFW!!!
item.content:encoded: NSFW!!! Today on 50 Shades of The Tribe, Shandy, Tim and Colleen strap on the leather and bust out the safe words to bring you this off-season podcast!  They dig deep to discuss the book and movie 50 Shades of Grey.  They are also joined by several subs.. erm… guests.  AGAIN! NSFW!!!
